data.lyric:
[ti:Don't Go Yet]
[ar:Camila Cabello]
[al:Familia (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Don't Go Yet - Camila Cabello (卡蜜拉·卡贝罗)
[00:02.08]Lyrics by：Camila Cabello/Mike Sabath/Eric Frederic/Scott Harris
[00:02.99]Composed by：Camila Cabello/Mike Sabath/Eric Frederic/Scott Harris
[00:03.92]
[00:08.75]I replayed this moment for months
[00:12.50]Alone in my head waiting for it to come
[00:16.74]
[00:17.40]I wrote all your lines in the script in my mind
[00:21.22]And I'd hoped that you'd follow it for once
[00:25.44]
[00:26.44]I imagined myself in satin the room was platinum and gold
[00:29.93]I'd dance and catch your eye you'd be mesmerized oh
[00:34.02]
[00:35.08]We'd find a corner there
[00:36.15]Your hands in my hair
[00:37.23]Finally we're here so why
[00:39.40]You saying you got a flight
[00:40.59]Need an early night
[00:41.50]No
[00:42.19]
[00:42.71]Don't go yet
[00:43.77]Oye don't go yet
[00:46.72]Don't go yet
[00:48.10]Oye don't go yet
[00:51.16]Don't go yet
[00:52.50]Oye don't go yet
[00:55.53]Don't go yet 
[00:56.89]What you leavin' for when my night is yours
[00:59.11]Just a little more don't go yet
[01:01.30]
[01:02.09]Baby don't go yet cause I wore this dress for a little drama
[01:05.36]And I bet I bet that you think that you know
[01:08.10]But you don't baby come to mama
[01:09.69]I get I get what I want when I want
[01:12.46]And I get it how I wanna wanna
[01:14.09]And I want you baby
[01:16.31]Gotta get you baby
[01:18.60]We'd find a corner there
[01:19.87]Your hands in my hair
[01:20.93]Finally we're here so why
[01:23.04]You saying you got a flight
[01:24.22]Need an early night
[01:25.15]No
[01:26.37]Don't go yet
[01:27.34]Oye don't go yet
[01:30.37]Don't go yet
[01:31.72]Oye don't go yet
[01:34.76]Don't go yet
[01:36.13]Oye don't go yet
[01:39.17]Don't go yet 
[01:40.49]What you leavin' for when my night is yours
[01:42.73]Just a little more don't go yet
[01:44.98]
[01:53.98]Oh no no don't leave yet
[01:56.28]No te vayas quédate
[01:57.62]Dale
[01:58.48]Oh no no don't leave yet
[02:00.76]No te vayas quédate
[02:02.34]Ahora voy yo
[02:03.49]Stay a little longer
[02:05.74]I know you really wanna
[02:07.83]Stay a little longer
[02:10.25]
[02:11.13]Oye don't go yet
[02:14.02]Don't go yet
[02:15.41]Oye don't go yet
[02:18.36]Don't go yet
[02:19.70]Oye don't go yet

data.trans:
[ti:Don't Go Yet]
[ar:Camila Cabello]
[al:Familia (Explicit)]
[by:p_pxjwang]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.08]//
[00:02.99]//
[00:03.92]
[00:08.75]数月来 这刻画面在我脑海里不断上演
[00:12.50]独自期盼着 等待着爱的来临
[00:16.74]
[00:17.40]我为你书写好了台词 剧本就在我脑海中
[00:21.22]希望你能如我所愿排演一次
[00:25.44]
[00:26.44]我想象自己身着缎质衣衫 在金碧辉煌的房间
[00:29.93]我翩翩起舞 你目不转睛 你会陷入我的魅力
[00:34.02]
[00:35.08]我们找到一个角落
[00:36.15]然后你的手伸进我的发间
[00:37.23]我们终于共沐爱河 所以为何
[00:39.40]你说你要赶飞机
[00:40.59]需要早点入眠
[00:41.50]不
[00:42.19]
[00:42.71]现在不要离开
[00:43.77]现在不要离开
[00:46.72]现在不要离开
[00:48.10]现在不要离开
[00:51.16]现在不要离开
[00:52.50]现在不要离开
[00:55.53]现在不要离开 
[00:56.89]我把夜晚的时间都交给了你 你还要去哪里
[00:59.11]再流连片刻吧 现在不要离开
[01:01.30]
[01:02.09]宝贝 现在不要离开 因为我穿上这裙装 就是想和你出演爱情戏码
[01:05.36]我打赌你一定胸有成竹 
[01:08.10]但事情并不在你掌控中 宝贝 到你的爱人这里来
[01:09.69]我总能 我总能心想事成
[01:12.46]我会如愿以偿
[01:14.09]而我想要你 宝贝
[01:16.31]我要得到你 宝贝
[01:18.60]我们找到一个角落
[01:19.87]然后你的手伸进我的发间
[01:20.93]我们终于共沐爱河 所以为何
[01:23.04]你说你要赶飞机
[01:24.22]需要早点入眠
[01:25.15]不
[01:26.37]现在不要离开

[01:30.37]现在不要离开
[01:31.72]现在不要离开
[01:34.76]现在不要离开
[01:36.13]现在不要离开

[01:40.49]我把夜晚的时间都交给了你 你还要去哪里
[01:42.73]再流连片刻吧 现在不要离开

[01:56.28]不要离开 留下来
